But they gladly take your money and you can see where there is plenty of room for growth. but apparently Two Men And A Dog do not care if you like their game or not they just want your money and that's it. Would have given a 5 star for this game but gamers will not keep it going and updated. shame

Love he game but would not advise anyone putting any money into this game. I have had this game for over two years now. And they Do Not keep their updated. Just says new challenges coming soon. If it hasn't came in two years it probably isn't. If they would add new challenges I would love to give them a five star. But for the last two years they just want to take your money. So if this game just earn your gems to get more drones and to update her tools. Don't pay them money for not keeping this game going. Plenty of room to update they just will not do it. Funny characters, endearing cartoon aesthetic and enjoyable game play, but after a couple hunts forces you to wait over 8 minutes before you can actually play again (in order to entice you to pay to make the wait times go away). What kind of game compels you to QUIT out of BOREDOM after playing it for 5 minutes?

I would have rated this game 5 stars but for the fact that I'm at level 82 and it says more missions coming soon... Who does that? This is the best game I've played in a while so it was a bummer when I saw the message. Explain why this is so or just fix it already. I have no issues with the game itself - control, graphics etc, but this pause is driving me crazy. There's no game without a mission. It defeats the purpose.

comments: I really love playing skipbo but now the ads are getting to be outrageous. Not only are the ads after every turn you make but now they freeze constantly and I have to shut down and restart it. I would buy the 2$ but that still has ads too; so what's even the point... so dissapointed.

I get that ads should be used to support a free app.. But this game is unplayable due to every ad they insert. Literally after every action is another 30 sec ad. You can't even play the main game because they kill you with ads. Uninstalling.

I really enjoy this game but there are too many ads and it crashes every now and then. Online play is kind of bad because it pairs you with ppl that dont ever play and if they do its every couple days until you can play your turn, which could be just to discard a card. I do absolutely like this game. I play actual card game still to this day. Great app just needs work. Will update more stars after updates start coming out.

Would be nice if the game would stop glitching and making me lose coins. Edit: I was excited about the update but there's still glitches!! You pay a coin to use the extra card in your hand boost and the robots get to have 5 cards but you only get 2 or 3 or if you're lucky you'll get 4 cards in total in your hand.

I love the game, the set up is great but if you want more people to actually play the you get rid of some of the ads. I completely understand that the ads are a key point but not it is annoying while your in a middle of a game and an ad pop up. Sorry but it makes me not want to play. I have never wrote a comment or rated a game for the simple fact that if I didn't like it I would just delete the app or game but I took my time to write this one because I really love this game and it brings back lots of childhood memories and I don't have to actually sit down and play with others

So many ads they interfere with gameplay! What should be a quick turn becomes a 3 minute play. I don't ads, I support developers making money and even click on ads for bonuses, but this is ridiculous. The game is also laggy, which I suspect if from the ads trying to load. Expect game crashes as well - one occurs every gameplay for me.

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

Features:
-Pixel cube graphics
-Six levels to conquer
-Precision aiming
-Radar map
-Health meter
-Perks & power-ups
-Blocky weapon collect
recentChanges: You now get a temporary shield that protects you from all damage, after reviving from death.
summary: Strike hard or die in this most amazing running and shooting action game
title: American Block Sniper Survival

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Excellent game. Best Idle, if not best game period on the market. Not really P2W, just pay to speed up. Heroes are amazing, unique and cool. There are also lots of other things to do besides just idle and wait to get stronger. So much content and you're given free gems from watching adds. Doesn't make you pay to succeed or have fun. Literally no complaints. And that's coming from someone that just in general has an issue with 99% of mobile  games. Download this!

Fun at first, but you have to pay a lot of real money for it to stay fun. Otherwise you have to wait weeks and months to progress. Some events can only be fully completed by spending hundreds of dollars (yeah, that much). Not worth it. If you have that much money, use it on something better than this. Improve your life, use your time better, don't waste it here. Good luck!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

description: After the success of Cheeseburger factory, bhelpuri maker, and Italian food factory frolicfox proudly presents Potato Chips factory for those who love playing cooking and food making games.Potato chips are the most favorite and easily cooked snacks loved by kids and star chef. The great chef makes easy snack right in the microwave and on the stove!Making Homestyle potato chips masala in your own kitchen is fun and easy. Experiment with the thickness; you may like them thicker or thinner. You can use best ingredients to cook potato chips with low fats, like olive oil, safflower, corn, or peanut oil as well as vegetable oil.Potato chips masalas factory game trained you in a way so that you will be able to save a lot of hard-earned cash with less effort. Stop paying too much for the packed chips, instead try out at your own potato chips factory and prove yourself a master chef. Learn how easy it is to make your own homemade potato chips with an easy-to-follow recipe with photos of each step. The hardest part of potato chips cooking is cutting them thin which is easy in our factory with modern cutters and utensils. Enjoy potato chips maker and cooking game on your smartphone and enjoy yourself as a crazy chef.  How to Cook The recipe for cooking potato is very simple and saves a lot of time. You just need to follow the following easy steps. First of all to cook potato chips turn your deep fryer on high. Fill it up about halfway with cooking oil. Wash potatoes, Remove the chaff, sliced the potatoes with the cutting tools available in the factory. Boil the oil mixture and add sliced potatoes in it.  Add the chips to finish off and crisp up. After lifting them from the oil and letting them drain and cool, carefully take them out and put the chips on a plate. Add spices, black pepper, slats, and flavors to make it more delicious. After finish cooking gathers all the chips and starts packing. Pack the chips in colored wrappers and deliver them to the shop. Potato chips factory is a crazy cooking and food maker game for kids, little girls, and boys who love cooking.

description: #1 MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME IN THE WORLD!Get ready for a journey unlike any other!Mirages of an unknown city have been seen around the world. Is it real … or a hoax? While your detective agency is busy gathering information, your friend is dragged into the phantom city by black smoke. The only one who can save him, you must now enter the strangest place you’ve ever been … where magic, witchcraft and science work together, imagination turns real and weird creatures wander the streets. All around there are people and things gaining unusual abilities and a black smoke that seems to be alive, bringing with it enigmatic artifacts, secrets and dangers.In order to rescue your friend and solve these unexplained phenomena, you will need to fulfill risky quests, explore dungeons, research amulets and get help from friends. Unravel the many mysteries of Shadow City as you fight monsters, confront a cult and rid the city of a horrible evil!While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. descriptionHTML:
#1 MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME IN THE WORLD!

Get ready for a journey unlike any other!
Mirages of an unknown city have been seen around the world. Is it real … or a hoax? While your detective agency is busy gathering information, your friend is dragged into the phantom city by black smoke. The only one who can save him, you must now enter the strangest place you’ve ever been … where magic, witchcraft and science work together, imagination turns real and weird creatures wander the streets. All around there are people and things gaining unusual abilities and a black smoke that seems to be alive, bringing with it enigmatic artifacts, secrets and dangers.

In order to rescue your friend and solve these unexplained phenomena, you will need to fulfill risky quests, explore dungeons, research amulets and get help from friends. Unravel the many mysteries of Shadow City as you fight monsters, confront a cult and rid the city of a horrible evil!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● 41 eerie locations to search

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

description: Take control of some amazing police drift cars (speed car, SUV, and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains: more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads!Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.!! The most realistic and extreme car driving game you'll ever experience, Police Drift Car Driving Simulator!
descriptionHTML:
Take control of some amazing police drift cars (speed car, SUV, and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains: more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads!
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
Customize them with brush and decals, then change tire, wheel, smoke colors, and more...
Drift in a whole city with realistic and intense traffic, and try 8 tracks to pull off super long drifts.
Complete tons of missions to become a professional drifter and a good cop!

The city is very big with real traffic cars, buildings, houses, bridges and traffic lights.
Drive around and see the sights like rivers and lakes, an ancient Japanese temple, airport with other aircrafts and planes, secluded houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...

description: Hippo presents a new game from the series of games for girls, the game Hippo's Nail Salon. Would you like to try yourself as a professional stylist and get to know how to paint nails correctly, to make a stylish manicure and maybe you would like to know what is it a unique art design of nails? Then try to play the game Hippo's Nail Salon and create an art design of nails, which any princess would like!Stylish nails and a beautiful make up are important for girls. But if you make a stylish fragrant make up and a beautiful manicure, any photo or just an ordinary selfie will be unbelievably astonishing. But the real beauty of the manicure is not just a bright nail polish and all possible images on nails. An astonishing manicure is worth doing because of its uniqueness, the taste for art and original art of the nail master. To make a beautiful manicure, master should practice a lot and have a lot of manicure tools, a wide variety of nail polishes, stickers, sparkles and so on. Real beauty is a result of a hard work. And if you have everything to make stylish nails, where could you get a wide variety of manicure tools, nail polishes, stickers, sparkles and so on? All that you could find in the game Hippo's Manicure Salon! This game has everything to use your imagination in a full swing. There aren't any limits for your art! You could combine ready-made and create new astonishing images and patterns on the nails of clients. Use your imagination, and any princess will send selfies with your manicure to all her friends. And don't forget to take photo of your best work!And let's start! Nail salon is waiting for its new master! You are the super professional stylist, and you know for sure, how to polish nails correctly, make a fashion manicure and a unique art design of nails! To play the game Hippo's Nail Salon is a dream of any princess! Our educational games for girls will make you happy!

description: The best game for girls this summer now with new super cool activities: boat party, ice slush and dolphin rescue!Join the Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun club and play the best summer holiday games for kids and toddlers! comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

descriptionHTML:
“We're ship-wrecked. Stranded on a deserted island. Us Orcs are frightened, we won't survive if no one takes the lead...”

Help us! Lead us! We will follow you to fortune and glory, and together we WILL conquer this dangerous new territory!

Strength and honour!

GAMEPLAY:
Orcs is based on the loved incremental / idle game concept and extends it with fortress building and quests.
Orcs is simple fun, specially if your into tapping.

FEATURES:
+Tap for wood, the faster you tap the more boni you get.
+Upgrade your axe and orcs, and increase your revenue stream.
+Build your fortress, unlock new features as you go.
+Level up your Orc squad, to become stronger.
+Send them on quests to conquer, make new friends and drive the story along.

If you were looking for a well crafted idle game with that extra touch, look no longer you found it.

description: You might have played many police transport games but this new robot transport game comes with a different set of challenges from other US police transport games. Police Robot Car Game – Police Plane Transport is a brand new edition to the police robot games from the city of New York with US police transform robot. NYPD police and LAPD has collaborated a secret police mission to transform robot car into police robot transforming bots to root out crime from their cities. You will get to drive best police transport truck, car, bike and police aeroplane all-in-one game for NY police. Transport robot car and bike in police truck to airport and then fly cargo plane as an airplane pilot to the secret island where NYPD police research center is located. So get into action with fast police car driving of police car games and robot shooting missions of robot action games to enjoy unparalleled entertainment of best robot games in this car transporter game. No car transporter games provide gameplay as holistic as this police robot games. Afterwards, the transforming robots will be trained to kill criminals. In case you are fan of police transport games and enjoy robot transform games, you will love this police plane game. Realistic 3D models of robot cars, police airplanes, moto robots and highly detailed environment makes police robot simulator more engaging than other police robot games. Captivating gameplay from best robot games is combined with vehicle controls of best transport games to push this new police game in the category of best police games. comments: Guys, this is an amazing game! Seriously, only problem the jump button is EXTEMELY unresponsive.. especially on the swimming levels, is this a design choice or a small bug, because on the normal land levels its "ok" still horrible but on the swimming levels its extremely unresponsive and is hard to stay consistant. This is the games biggest flaw. Its EXTREMELY unresponsive

Great game! Quite challenging, and really fun. I have a small bug to report. On level 8 on Classic mode, the air meter is messed up. Multiple times I have spawned and immediately died from drowning. Pretty annoying. Also, when you first enter the spinning spike section (level 8 or 9, I can't remember), the entry field is placed quite high. Sometimes I try to swim under the spikes on lvl 8 and then get warped to the next section and immediately touch the spinning spikes. But other than those two bugs, the game is amazing!

Hardest game i've ever played, but i completed all of the current levels,best game ever! waiting for the new levels! Stop crying about levels 8 and 9, they are easy! you just need to learn the pattern, after I learnt it now I can beat the game with ZERO DEATHS! So if you can't do this it dosen't mean it's impossible you noobs!

Love this game! I have beaten both new and classic levels and they are awesome. The spinning line of blades that go up and down the screen in Level 8 is especially brutal, and took me several tries to beat. To everyone saying its impossible, its not. Just keep trying and you will get it. Overall just a fun mobile game.

descriptionHTML:
Traps, Traps and Traps. One of the best new game of 2018 and one of the most popular adventure mobile game.

Start Playing Trap Dungeons 2 Adventure game today.

Trap Dungeons 2 is a simple 2D action adventure crazy game where you have to go from one point to the other. Just beware of the traps.

WHAT'S YOUR NEXT MOVE?

Features:

* 2D crazy adventure game
* Multiple levels with increasing difficulty
* A wide variety of traps
* Easy to use controls
* Puzzle game with lots of puzzles to solve using your brain
* A bunch of surprises that you may or may not like
* New levels are added every week
* Special hard levels for hardcore gamers
* No Internet Game - one of the best offline games
* 8 Bit Game
* Free to play ,Say NO to Pay to win.
* Adventure game filled with frustrating Traps
* Run like hell. Running is the best step you can go for.

The infamous Trap Dungeons 2 is finally out on android.

Follow the levels of Epic Saga Adventure in Trap Dungeons 2 which is loved by thousands of players around the world. Compete with friends and please don’t rage quit. Be vigilant and aware of your crazy surroundings.

Trap Dungeons 2 is easy to control 2D Adventure Game but hard to master. Trap Dungeons 2 is a symbol of retro platform adventure games

Trap dungeons 2 is an action packed, 2D adventure best offline game.

Caution!! This may be the most hardest, irritating, frustrating game EVER.
As written above, Trap Dungeons 2 is VERY STRESSFUL.
You may get so irritated and frustrated that you throw your phone out the window.

Even after reading this you are still eager to try this hard game - Trap Dungeons 2, then go ahead.

And may be someday you'll get out of Trap Dungeons 2 . Though I doubt it.

Don't you get bored from all these famous games on Android play store like any famous game or any top free games? Well, It's time for some change. Begin the era of hardest games on earth like Trap Dungeons. Throughout Trap Dungeons 2 you will get 2D cubic adventure with extreme hard levels.

comments: As an idle game, love it; just one wish - Is there really no option to auto-reincarnate? Easily dealing with lvl15k mobs through Bar brawl (yes, I've dropped bout a $30) yet I'm only at 15-20 reincarnations (round lvl 5k at stage 200).. Let me leave the app open for an hour and gain.. Like, 3 reincarnations; please.

Pretty good game. Few suggestions:  1. Make this completely offline gathering.  If I leave the game for whatever reason and come back to it, sometimes I can see gold accumulate and sometimes not.  2. When watching ads for gems: the game pauses.  If the gold keep accumulates, I am happy to keep watching ads.
Why is the font so blurry? Also "you will watch ads" sounds like a threat lol. Might want to work on that translation

Pretty good for the most part. My only concern is that we only have one controlable skill beside our energy beam attack. Wish there was more. Other than that I love the graphics along with the how the game is expanding the clicking genre of rpg's. Keep up the good work.
Not bad. Old school graphics, fast pace. Time consuming (because of ads)

Great game but it definitely needs more useable skills. I think even during my first run I hardly touched any of them.   Seriously needs the ability to auto-reincarnate a lot earlier. As it stands you have to practically accomplish everything possible to finally auto reincarnate and at that point, you don't need to do runs anymore.

description: Amazing Crime Strange Stickman is a grand city simulator in third person view (and FPS mode), where you drive a car or a motorbike / bike and become a real boss driver. Exciting gameplay: you are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vega disctrict. You play is a mad future unknown hero / legend and whole city fears you. The style of city is similar to Miami, Andreas, London or Las Vegas but actualy it's New York. Become a chief on the streets of anti criminality in town. Be ready to investigate huge theft. Are your ready for great anti criminal adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, clash, shoot thugs and fight all the criminals! Spider police and swat will help you. Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter. You can also buy a lot of Gtw things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners.Become Qta citizen hope as a standard of pure law and justice, or come to the city as a new doom knight. Most of the missions will be on the begas streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc. You were on a Incredible superhero secret mission, stealing the important information about the enemies, the army base camps, rebels and the underworld Mafia. You will fight various star mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive super cars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game! Explore the crime city, full of gangs and aggressive fractions. Don't mess with the police, they are the good ones. Good old story about an anti car thief in a dangerous town. Dominate the city with a devastating fire power of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks! Let it be as a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery.You have special real tga powers. You can shoot dangerous laser beam from your san eyes. You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top. Your legs are also very powerful. Don't underestimate them. • Visually stunning urban graphics, character and army vehicle models, Helicopter, Air fighter, autobot etc.• HD quality graphics• Hours of gameplay on the battleground where you have to survive and be the last man standing• Ingame war craft shop• Guns to buy and shoot• Off road terrains to explore• Realistic car drifting• One of the best free play games / allgames / topgame

description: War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!-GAME FEATURES-● Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game● Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!● Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.● Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.● Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!● Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.● Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!● Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.● Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support via email: support@hourgames.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarStormCOH
descriptionHTML:
War Storm: Clash of Heroes is a Global Strategy MMO mobile game. Players take control of the legion of heroes and a castle, a stronghold, a nation, and all its subjects. Summon brave heroes of war to your cause, hone their skills or magic in combat, send them to the frontier, and use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle, watch the epic scene of clash of elites! Form alliances with other players, defend Alliance Strongholds and castles against your enemies and take your revenge with your ally by Rally Attacks, take the chance and wow the world! Become a royale king of civil age and clash off the invading demon legions, or those vicious warlord armies who surge into ally's city. Write your own epic story in chaos; let the glory of might shine in honor!

-GAME FEATURES-

● Free Social Strategy MMO Mobile Game
● Innovative world map tactics! Take control of resources to expand your royale empire and position your forces in camps around the map to protect the kingdom in chaos!
● Complete Quests to win Heroes to your cause, or Summon them from beyond with Soul Shards recovered in the frontier of battle.
● Craft weapons & armor for your Heroes from rare hearth materials found around the world map.
● Form alliances with friends around the world to complete Alliance Quests, Send Aid to ally's nation, and Rally Attack your enemies!
● Seize, develop and defend an Alliance Stronghold with your allies.
● Sectioned World Map - growing your empire might give you access to new places!
● Build diverse legions of foot soldiers, archers, mages, catapults and more! Outsmart your enemies by outfitting the winning combinations in battle.
● Fight hellish monster legion under the leadership of Arch Demon. Become a powerful clasher and you might have to fight the Demon himself!

Problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support via email: support@hourgames.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarStormCOH

comments: You had my attention, and now you have my money. Yes, this is a good game. However, it costs too much real money to advance this game. There are many missing pieces and too much to acquire to be able to progress. Maybe instead of making it so in depth, take it down a notch. Let people use junked cars to fix cars and sell them, if this is already an option make it easier to do so. I think this is a good game just too in depth and not enough give to make it entertaining and fun at this time.

Great time killer... Love it so far and only been playing since yesterday... Already level 11 and got quite a few things however I gave 4 stars because I spent 10 diamonds on the bank which showed the stock market but didn't tell me it was coming soon until I paid for it... I like that this game doesn't make you pay real cash and gives you tokens just to win more cash, diamonds, energy etc so please don't ruin the game in the future and make us pay 2 play =)

The game is over good. It's definitely fun for your car enthusiasts but I am now level 11 and I can't obtain "glass" to build any buildings... The game is getting boring because I can't move up, it's pretty much scrap cars and sell parts... I don't want to rate this game too high because I believe it still is a work in progress, but yes it's a good game and I would recommend it

It's a decent concept. Good time killer for a little while. I don't know why all these games take energy. Just let me play the damn game. And the constantly fluctuating prices to sell the parts got old REAL QUICK! Apparently the creators of this game have never been to a salvage yard in their life.

Game is simple and easy to play but the materials are hard to get and even when have enough to repair a building it's not working. Also the rewards to leveling up are very low for the amount of work needed to get there. After about level 11 or 12 is just more experience but the same $100 and 10 energy cap increase. No diamonds and no material for leveling up. Fix these few issues and I'm sure this game will keep it's fun factor a little longer

Great time killer! Simple to play, though a few information/help would be nice for a few items, the auto sell option and the bailer so you know exactly what they do.  The developer does listen to the players and fixes things! Only true issues that I have are 1)the materials needed to build the buildings in incredibly high, not really obtainable for game play, even for someone who would play constantly
description: Want to start your own vehicle business? If you love vehicles and automobiles, you will love this virtual business game of vehicles. It is unique and extremely entertaining.Junkyard Tycoon is a game where you start your own garbage garage, buy vehicles or vehicle parts, detach vehicle parts, sell them and make profit. While you slowly make good business out of junk vehicle parts, you become a junkyard tycoon.Just keep buying and selling vehicles or vehicle parts. The twist of the game is that you can make profit while selling different vehicle parts. You can buy Car,Truck,Motorbike,Boats  at scrapyard prices and you will be able to sell vehicle parts individually to make good money. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills. “Junkyard Tycoon” is the best time management game for unlimited fun and salvage yard business.The game is all about right set of Wreckers business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing vehicle business game where you can buy junk cars, trucks, vans, or any other moving parts of vehicles and test your business skills to become a real Magnate. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The Wrecking Yard economy game is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and start your own Scrapheap Challenge.************************SAY HELLO************************We are constantly working hard on making the “Junkyard Tycoon” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

comments: Great game. . .until the latest update.  As other reviewers are saying, we can't open the game at all! Stuck on initializing.  I'm guessing, though, that since so many of us are having the same issue, it'll get fixed soon.  I'll amend my rating higher if it does.

After months of playing this game.. i came to this new update now.. and its  logging. I cant open the app now.. still looking for new content then nothing happens. It stucks in there.. someone please help me.. i have experience this ones when i came to play with the cruise then just moment the game freezez.. and have to wait for another update.. after then i can access the game.. but i think now is different.. does anybody have an experience about this?

After the latest update I can't even open the game. It freezes at initializing 100%. I tried all the trouble shooting tips and even uninstalled it. I was at level 42, I've spent a lot of time and money on this game and if they don't get it fixed soon I'm uninstalling for good. It's been 25 days, I installed the update and still can't play. I'm uninstalling for good!

Limiting us to 20 boost a day now really stinks. I really enjoyed the game and the chase to first place in the tournament. But now with this new limitation and place I cannot help my teammates as much as I used to. Very disappointed in this upgrade

But now when ever i go on there to play , it says "OFFLINE" clearly still lets me play . Its kinda getting annoying in and out of the game to log in to Facebook everytime. Must have something to do with the last update.  Please fix this, i love love love this game. And i just went a level . Dont make delete this game again My wi fi and bluetooth are always on too  Im on level 12

Have to add my disappointment with this app and the last update!!! I'm having the issue as others... App will only open to the main screen of initiating 100% then nothing happens!!! I'm disappointed that I'm going to loose my resort level and its benefits... Thanks I will delete this review if you make things right
description: Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Adventure unfolds all around your island! ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.• The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.• You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga’s Privacy Policy, found at  http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

comments: I absolutely love love LOVE this game. Im no bot i swear. This game is so addictive. Gameplay is great. A few suggestions however. Sometimes i find my "sword" just going right through some fish, and it doesnt kill them. Also, maybe switch up some ways to get Stars. I find myself saving so much to get the 99k sword fish and never buy any other fishes. I feel like the players should work their way up slowly and not have to play with only the "daily reward" fishes. Just my suggestion  Thank you guys!

Great game, good servers, rarely any lag, and addicting. However, the price for characters is pretty steep, their not even worth buying since you'll get better daily characters by the time you have enough stars to buy a good character. Save up for the end game characters. Also, the left joystick is fairly close to the edge of the screen and makes it a little hard to stay on the screen. You get use to it after a while but it would be nice to have other control setups or custom controls.
Great game. Just the spawns on Kill the King and stuff suck since people can spawn right in you. Also, it is kinda rigged when you have the default fish vs someone with one of the best ones.
Great game, its so addicting!  But there is only 1 problem, theres so much lag. Pls fix!! :)

You guys have so much potential and you can do allot I know it! Dab on the HATERS (even though there hating you because they can't make a game and hate ads) but one thing WHY IS ALL CHARACTERS 99.99$ I know other games do it but still lower price and I will rate 5
Love the game, only complaint is about the in app purchases. The sword extensions are marketed as "+5" or "+10" but I own both +5 and +10 and my sword only starts out as 10. Please fix this!
description: Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other. Dash to your enemy and kill them!Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!HOW TO PLAY:Control with Joystick your direction.Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.  * Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here. So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.*Attention this app requires good internet connection!* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
descriptionHTML:
Pixel Swordfish.io is a game about cute creatures piercing each other.
Dash to your enemy and kill them!
Your goal is become the creature with biggest nose in the world.If your nose touches another player, he will explode and you will get another point. But if others run into YOU, then you are defeated and game is over.
In Pixel Sword fish .io game, you have a chance to win even if you have tiny nose. You can attack from sides or rear of a much larger and bigger nose player to defeat them, no matter how big your nose are!

HOW TO PLAY:
Control with Joystick your direction.
Using a boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) can make your worm creature to run faster with higher speed but running fast will reduce your energy! (need time to fill it up).
Dash into opponents like a arrow and Kill enemies to rise your nose and get stars. Popup the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with different noses in shop.

Pixel Sword Fish io game have 6 modes:
* Classic --- you are fight with other worms collecting stars, rise and evolve your tusk, trying to earn trophy to unlock next Arena.
* Team play --- players dived on and each team have a ticket count so when there is no more ticket you can't revive until game over.
* Survival --- 50 crazy players in one room! The rule is simple one life, you don't have another chance !
* Kill the king -- in this little rom one is a king with big tusk and body and other players trying to kill him to became the new king so defend yourself or attack depends who you are on that time.
* Smash --- overcrowded tiny room with angry players you should be very fast with good reactions to survive in that insanity, no escape from this place .
* One sword pro --- only true masters who are really fast (who craft more than 1200 trophies) are allowed to play in that room only one sword characters are allowed no slither movements are welcome here.

So, what are you waiting for? get this cool new app now!
Develop your battle skills start the war and try to survive in crowded and dangerous water world.

*Attention this app requires good internet connection!
* If you have any idea or suggestion please contact us on Facebook
summary: Dash to your enemy and kill them! Pixel cute creatures piercing each other.
title: Pixel Sword Fish io

description: Who will get to the top of Mount Dragon first? Blaze and AJ need help to speed past Crusher's obstacles to win the Adventure Race Pro Duel!This game will outstand you, boys, and we say boys because it's a car racing game and well, let's face it, there are few girls that love to play cars games, especially racing cars, and you boys sure do have the skills to play this kind of games. We uploaded this game category for boys, and the first game from this category is called Blaze Mud Race Mountain. Blaze and his best friend AJ were challenged by their rival, Crusher, on a race along the dangerous Adventure Race, but Crusher is not playing fair, using cheat tips, so, your two best friends, Blaze and AJ are really counting on your help. You have to watch out for the obstacles such as big rocks and oil puddles, and on your way up to the top try to collect as many red flags as possible in order to beat Crusher.

description: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARSWe have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTSYou will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.REALISTIC TRAFFICStaying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!FREE TO PLAYThe Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.GAME FEATURES▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seatbelt, start your engine and get ready for some real driving! This isn't one of those fantasy scenarios, where cars behave like children's toys and all you have to do is drive as fast as you can. This is a game for true car enthusiasts. Select one of many meticulously rendered vehicles and take it for a spin in a lifelike environment. Cruise in the subburbs, traverse the city streets and show you have what it takes to consider yourself a real driver.

A VARIETY OF EXCITING CARS

We have something for everyone. There's a sports car, a pickup, a caravan, even a police van! Every one of them poses a different challenge. Learn to take advantage of their strengths, work around their weaknesses!

BELIEVABLE CITY ENVIRONMENTS

You will drive around tracks designed to look as lifelike as possible. City streets are bustling with traffic, the details give the surroundings a real sense of place.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC

Staying on course and avoiding the obstacles won't be your only concern. You also have to mind other cars. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!

FREE TO PLAY

The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases.

GAME FEATURES

▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ ARENA: Each track is a challenge full of obstacles and opportunities.
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel or Tilt Controls
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view
developerAddress:

comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. 😊  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

Excellent game. Quite fast response on my phone. There is as almost after every level but it's ok. You can quickly click the x to close the ad. I was hoping for long words more than 6 letters but it appears that this game has only up to six letter word puzzles. I am currently at 490 level.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay
• Totally FREE for all players
• Suitable for both kids and adults to train word search skills
• No network required and you can enjoy word search at any time

DOWNLOAD now to begin training your brain and become a real master of word search puzzles on BOARDS!

comments: BEST FREE GAME EVER!! I have been playing for almost a year now and I love this game. You don't need to put in money unless you want to play for a long time. Each ad you watch gives you cherries to play the game, so its like getting paid to watch them. I am playing now and I just had to stop and share how fun this game is. If you like BINGO, this is the game for you!

Used to be fun when you could win cherries but now there is absolutely no way to win them. I know most the bingos are fake people getting them because there is no way to bingo after three numbers have been called, but yet 5 people will get bingo after three numbers every round. Such a shame because this could be the best bingo game ever, but i guess this bingo game is all about ripping people off. Wish it would go back the way it was and be fun again. Rainbow bingo adventure has become my new bingo game, it is alot like bingo pop but actually lets you win!!!

It could be one of the best bingo games out there, but its hard to keep up cherries when it barley will give you triple or mega. Also have lost cherries. Ive had at least 100 cherries. Come back a few hours later and they are all gone! And cutting in half the daily cherries I've already worked to get is ridiculous! Going to be uninstalling

I would give you 5 stars except for the last 3 to 4 days it keeps telling me I have new content over & over. It acts like it's updating only to tell me the same thing over & over. I have missed out on getting my daily credits because of this.

This game is so addictive can't stop playing it... Everyone should play Pop Bingo it's so Fun... I love it... The only thing I have to complain about is the cherries don't last you long enough... It's kinda hard to build the cherries up.. I wish Thier was More ways to get Free Cherries.. But other then that I can't stop playing this game ... Thanks so much for making a fun Bingo Game...

Love love love...Best bingo game. Been playing for years.. I play everyday.   Only problem I have is that I can't download on my tablet. I had it and it updated and won't let me download again ... Really sucks I much rather play on my tablet😫😥😏

Game is quite good but the developers have made it very challenging to get new tracks which makes an otherwise fantastic game very redundant. To the developers: you are already making money off the ads why dont you improve the gameplay to give out tracks faster. Also there should be an option to buy new types of trains using the stars earned apart from real money.

The Voxel Agents have struck gold yet again! I played Train Conductor 2 for a long time... Looks like i can play this one forever! I love the diversity in locations and the daily special events. No two challenges are the same. It's as hard to play as you want it to be or as easy as you need it to be. I absolutely love this game!

I love this game, a lot of fun when I need to disconnect from work.  But when I am forced to watch an ad just to get back to the map or between levels it just becomes annoying and seems desperate.  Now if I crash and want it undone sure I expect an ad but just to finish a level and get back to the map.....ffs!

My 4 year old grandson plays this , but u raise his score to get tiles every day and give useless wooden tiles when the game knows he needs allow to go over water. Even when u save up metal ones and trade it gives u useless curves  instead of straight peices.  Come on game people it's supposed to be for fun.
description: Train Conductor World is a high-speed train traversal puzzler; trundle, turn and track in this spectacular European adventure!Conduct and control the tracks, manage movement and watch your rail network grow. You’ll need nerves of steel and snappy strategy to keep the chaos under control. Be on high-alert for explosive crashes, near-misses and split second situations..Adventure across new terrain and connect the wonders of the European continent. Your trains will be barreling across the canals of Amsterdam, zooming around the Arc De Triomphe in Paris and navigating the perilous peak of the Matterhorn.Customise your trains to optimise your railway - use rocket boosters, star medallions and more to speed up your deliveries. It all counts when you’re growing the biggest railway in the world!The best train game around! Android permission requests;- Internet Access and Access Network State is used - to present a FAQ page and announcements from our studio within the game; to enable undoing of a crash for users who haven’t purchased remove ads; to show interstitial ads for users who haven’t purchased remove ads; to send anonymous usage statistics to help us improve the game. - Vibrate is used to enable the undo feature because some advertisement networks require vibration.- Billing is used if you decide to purchase anything within the game. All purchases are fully under your control at all times.
descriptionHTML:
Train Conductor World is a high-speed train traversal puzzler; trundle, turn and track in this spectacular European adventure!

Conduct and control the tracks, manage movement and watch your rail network grow. You’ll need nerves of steel and snappy strategy to keep the chaos under control. Be on high-alert for explosive crashes, near-misses and split second situations..

Adventure across new terrain and connect the wonders of the European continent. Your trains will be barreling across the canals of Amsterdam, zooming around the Arc De Triomphe in Paris and navigating the perilous peak of the Matterhorn.

Customise your trains to optimise your railway - use rocket boosters, star medallions and more to speed up your deliveries. It all counts when you’re growing the biggest railway in the world!

The best train game around!

comments: Love the game, easy to understand and they have videos on how to use the equipment and make ur farm expand. Also, their customer service is great!!  Recently my phone was stole and had to get a new phone.  Familyfarm helped me recover my farm within a couple of days.  Their services were quick and resourceful.

Fun game, but...What happened?  Don't like the snow,  it lightened all the colors of everything, they are not as vivid as they usually are.. With cataracts,  too hard on eyes,  all print got really small and can't read anymore.  Will have to quit til eyes get fixed.

I love the game and have played it for almost 5 years now but for some reason it will not connect to facebook. Not sure what happened in the last update. Hopefully it gets fixed soon. I would hate if my phone got messed up and my progress is not saved

The game used to be good but it has been hanging up repeatedly with the recent updates. Open a treasure chest/daily chest to get a reward will forever be loading and not running. Have to shut down the whole game and redo the quests again. Auto-save for the game had also been unstable, with us having to redo the stuff that we have done previously. It's very frustrating given that we have planted some crops and only to realise that the crops we had planted were not actually planted when we revisit the farm to harvest those crops.

This game was good and fine then it crashed and when I reopened it it had lost all my progress from level 36 to 21. What a waste of time so annoyed. How the hell do i get my game back? It looks like it connected to a Facebook account and loaded an old game but I don't gave the option to disconnect. So frustrated!

This was my favorite game but lately it has so many problems. Things I've completed keep DISSAPPERING and I have to keep redoing them to move on in the game. I've been asking for help for a few months now. Also there are tons and tons of issues with the game crashing. I've done everything to fix this that I was told to do yet nothing is working. As for contacting the link sent to the reply to this I've also done that a few times now with no help. I've been using the in game help tab and keep getting told its been sent to another help team. I've spent Way too much real money on this game and if not fixed soon will want it all back and the deleting the game.   Please fix this so once again I can give it 5 stars. Since the last update the game is now closing in it's own. This is very frustrating. So again as I've asked above please fix this .

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ App Notes
- This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.
- Family Farm Seaside is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

※ Contact Us!
- Family Farm Seaside Custmer Support: https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/family-farm-seaside/
- Need more neighbors and want to get game news and tips? »»» Like 👍 our official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/familyfarmseaside
- Privacy Policy: http://www.funplusgame.com/privacy_policy/

comments: I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

This game would be perfect if the controls were better. They are nonsense. Doesn't always shoot when I tap, jumping is crazy, and the game gives you multiple ways to control, but they are all garbage. Also would have appreciated a tutorial so I knew what I was doing

The best game on market right now. No ads, unless you request it for coins,(which I doubt you'll need to), many modes, including HELL(Infinite waves), MAP(To gain access to abilities and magic) and BATTLE(Normal wave advancement with bosses every 5 levels.). By far the best game that advertises it is not pay to play. Because it's not, despite the option to buy coins.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

I can't help but love a mobile game that doesn't constantly shove advertisements in your face. No silly energy system to make you wait to play, and while it has a real money store, it's tucked away in a corner where it belongs. Different control options and simple, accessible gameplay make this a hidden gem. 5 stars all the way. Kudos to the developer.

I really like the game. But there's one thing that annoys me: when I don't play this game for a few hours and then I do another battle in dungeon, the game crashes after killing last monster in that battle.  I found out that if I switch on mobile data it works. So I wanted to asked why is that. EDIT: now all works just fine. 5 stars

comments: Too many levels. Have to play through 20 6x6 levels just to unlock the next larger size. Slightly repetitive but a joy to play. Great job (update: highly addicted to the game. Unfortunate that its turned into a pay to play where I have to buy coins to unlock new levels. Might quit because of that but fun for the first few days)
Stop telling what a need to do when solving the puzzle.
It's like minesweeper mix with picross!
So far very good.

Great mix of many logic games.  Very unique game and very challanging.  Unlimited hints, but the hints show WHY, allowing you to learn and become better, allowing tou to challange yourself at your pace.  Ad's are completely optional.  You get a bonus to watch them, but the bonus does not change the playability of the game.  5 stars.  I wish there were 6 to give.

Loved the game, however as outlined by other users the coin system is bizzare. Packs 1-5 can be opened easily, however after that you simply cannot get enough coins to progress. Tried watching ads to collect coins but ran out of ads to watch (without even getting enough coins, had 50, needed 250 for the next pack, thats 125 ads! grr)

description: In Photo Roulette you compete with your friends to quickly guess whose photo is shown. Play with random photos from you and your friends' phones in this social and exciting Photo Roulette game! Feel the thrill before each picture and share the hilarious moments that occur with the pictures of your friends and family!In Photo Roulette, you and your friends team up and engage in a highly social game on your phones. In each round of Photo Roulette a random photo is chosen from one players’ photo library and briefly showed to all of the players. The players compete in quickly guessing whose photo it is, receiving a score based on time and accuracy of their answer. After 10 pictures, the Photo Roulette champion is crowned!Photo Roulette features:-	3-10 players in a competitive and easy-to-learn game-	Super fun and social PARTY GAME for all ages-	Get to know your friends and family through their photos-	Relive amazing moments with photos you had forgotten-	Highscore list after each round and game endThe photos are only displayed for 5 seconds, so your friends and family will only see them briefly. Feel the thrill before each picture and share the hilarious moments that occur with the pictures of your friends and family!

description: You’ve never played a wrestling game like this before!  The controls are simple and fun;  they might remind you of pool, marbles, or pinball. Classic wrestling moves and unique combos add exciting tactical and strategic depth. Bounce a monster strike at the exactly the right spot to KO your rival, save your signature move for a massive bodyslam, or bank a shot for a multi-hit combo.Collect, train, and promote hundreds of wrestlers. Combine the unique stats and abilities of your hyper heroes to build the perfect tag-team for each match and battle it out in extensive single player campaigns or the real-time PvP league. comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¶:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

description: ■ Survival mode unlocked!■ New items, stages and zombies!■ Adjusted difficulty level.■ SynopsisOnce an ordinary man, Peter is left to survive in midst of a zombie apocalypse. As he fights against them, his strength and skill grows.Your job is simple - survive.■ FeaturesKill zombies and collect Gold to upgrade teammates and various installations - to kill more zombies!Simply tap to fire your gun.Your tapping speed determines the firing speed.Hire teammates to increase chance of survival in this world of despair.Experience this simple, yet strategic game!■ InfoYou can use auto-fire when you reach a certain level.There are various skills that can save you from critical situation.Every teammate has different weapons, with unique attributes.Kill zombies for Gold. Use the Gold to upgrade teammates and maintain the camp.Offensive or deffensive? It all depends on your choice.As days pass zombies become stronger, and they will become even more powerful during night time. Collect various inventory items for additional strength.It's a good idea to check the type of item each Boss yields.Mine is a very powerful weapon with devastating damage.When barricade is breached, zombies can attack your teammates.Nuke will restart the game, but you'll keep inventory items.When you have an inventory item, obtain another identical item to upgrade it.If the game is too hard, try again from the start with your inventory items by using Nuke.There's a massive Last Boss waiting for you.■ This game saves player data in device.
