description: Euro Truck : Driving Simulator Cargo Delivery Game is a newly designed game open world driving game as the user will drive the euro cargo truck. The game features dual mode, one of which is free mode where the basic objective of the user is to survive in this track. Travel across many countries from Europe, visit incredible places like Berlin, Prague, Madrid, Rome, Paris and more! Play the career mode of this truck simulator, make money. The second mode is level mode as the user has to pass through certain checkpoints to reach the destination. Face extreme truck parking challenges with in time across open world environment. Enjoy 4 wheel and 8x8 offroad trucking on speed roads as the user will drive through treacherous road. The user will drive the the American truck and take ultimate risk as the user will drive the heavy duty truck. Become a truck driver in this exciting new truck simulation game. Get in your truck and deliver cargo to your destination. The track is exclusively design and driving through this track is the most realistic offroad driving experience.The user will drive the pickup truck and deliver multiple goods and items, the user has to pass through these tracks which are rugged terrains. Smash into traffic, cause chaos and drift around on the winter ice roads, Load cargo, detach your trailer and have fun becoming the ultimate truck driver. Avoid losing and falling any cargo box or your mission will be lost.   These bumpy roads really tests the user skill as the main challenge for the user is to don’t let the barrels drop of the truck. Feel like a real Trucker and deliver heavy packages loaded in your Euro truck. Operate big trucks to deliver packages. The track features both uphill and downhill drive as the user explore the truck and deliver cargo items.  Prove your driving skills by transporting cargo from one place to another in limited time safely. In this adventure of offroad truck the transporter driver will drive offroad cargo truck on dangerous high mountains, bridges and bumpy hills. Following are some amazing features:🚙	Realistic graphics.🚙	Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.🚙	Real Cargo truck off road tracks🚙	Realistic 3D camera angles.🚙	Multiple controller with both tilt and tappy buttons.🚙	Amazing sound effects (SFX).🚙	Various visual effects (VFX).🚙	Dynamic Goods transport challenging levels.🚙	Efficient processing with maximum Frames per second.🚙	Various innovative 3D camera view.🚙	Detailed instrument with speedometer and fuel gauge.🚙	Smooth control with efficient response.🚙	Ride on the dirt surface ramp.🚙	Drift & Drive as long as you can.🚙	Easy to drive and easy to handle.

descriptionHTML:
MORE THAN TRAFFIC OVERTAKING
Are you tired of overtake cars and vehicles only?
RG is a game for you, Watch and follow traffic positions, find and scoring goals.
Earn degree according to the danger of overtaking.
The closest is the highest score, the lowest is the lowest.
Racing Goals game designed for both boys and girls.

In real life, there is no "Replay" button, obey the rules, drive safely.
Games are fun things. Games make what we do not in real life.

Highlights
Many options for camera angles.
Five-lane highway.
Free and unlocked racer cars.
Dozens of different types of vehicles for feeling of real traffic. Trucks, suvs, buses, vans etc...
Scoring for actions, depending on the distance of overtaking.
Score system based on traffic positions.
Crazy definitions of traffic racing. cross goal, "between two cars" goal, break throw goal, and ladder pattern goals.
Different unusual sound and music settings. Stereo sound system for feeling fever of race.
Cool material, user friendly designed app and user interface. Very easy and very practical menu.
Very very serial control. Balanced realistic and idealistic controls.
According to varying game modes, super advanced traffic flow.
Focus on the racing without gear changes.
Fast and fast flo of game. No loading screen except the first opening.
Endless runner type 3D traffic racing.
For the beginning in ten languages: English, turkish, korean, spanish, russian, italian, portuguese, chinese, thai, vietnamese (EN, TR, KR, ES, RU, IT, BR, CN, TH, VN)
It is designed for the fastest, most dynamic 3D traffic racer purpose for very rapid overtaking vehicles in trafic.
Upgradeable car features with gold in app. Maximum speed, acceleration, braking, collision, and handling.
Made in 2016, most innovative and original race modes with 2017 model updates.
Always more than the classic highway traffic overtaking game.
Drive more speed for more goals. Increase the acceleration to increase the car's 0-100km acceleration time. Increase the collision parameter to increase the crash endurance of your car.
More races win more gold. Improve your car with every gold you earn.
Car tattoo and car paint are free. Up to the end of all cars, can be upgraded.


Graphics
Inspiration from nature. Natural environment, relaxing graphics.
Tropical environment, coastal road, forest roads, bridges ...
Morning, noon, sunset, rainy, cloudy atmosphere and environment.
Great and superb ways, high-quality three-dimensional roads.
Morning, day, forest and sunset with romantic view, sea view, highways.
All of the environments and atmosphere, selectable for each race.
Rich, different camera angles. action camera, rear cameras, overhead cameras.
Free customizations for car's colors and tattoos.
Choose your own tattoo and favorite color, blue, red, black..

Game modes - Racing modes
Seamless race modes, according to the traffic density and speed.
Modes for novice drivers or master driver.
Timed game modes. One minute, Two minute many goals.
Distance targeted competitions.
Crazy race modes. Plenty of goals, vertigo racer, reverse direction, no brakes...
The most dynamic race is many goals mod. For the lovers of traffic racer 3D action.

Achievements and leader ranking
Get in the best of the world. Top row Print the name.
Unlock hidden achievements by displaying their talents in the game and earn gold for the next achievements.

Road map
Updates more cars. (Always unlocked)
More leaderboards and achievements.
Different traffic racing game modes. Vertigo reverse direction mode and unless brake mods.
Carier mode. Extreme challenging driving tasks section. (For user which have reached 500. level)
General user requests.
More languages.

Tips
Play with accelerometer sensor.
Use brake more.
Select manual gas.
Make triple and quadruple ladder pattern for more points.
summary: Natural & flowing car racing game. Traffic positions and goals. Free luxury cars
title: Racing Goals

comments: Would have rated a 5, but I think the cost to continue a level ($300 and up) is disproportionate to the $$ awarded when you beat a level (< $50).  Exceptional storyline and graphics!  Cute animals and decorations. Love that I have several choices on some items. I hope new animals and habitats are available soon!
Ridiculous levels get to a point you can not beat the level even to spend money impossible.   Relaxing game to pass time turns into another delete like every game here.  Pathetic
It is quite a good game but it takes too long to win enough tickets or rocka to do anything at the zoo. Then it becomes frustrating. I refuse to spend money to get extra points.

I thought this game was fun UNTIL it said you had to WAIT FOR MORE QUESTS!  This happened after each completion of an enclosure...very frustrating!  Have been waiting two days, so far, for a new enclosure quest:(  Not very professional!

This game is ridiculous.   Have to do games to get things and then when you open up to get animals youbthen have to play multiple games to get items to expand or play or train.  Way too much and only get 5 lives for all the different games you are forced to play.

The game is enjoyable but I don't care for the new animated Charlotte. Instead of adding "realism", she is simply annoying. Other than that, it's fairly good. The number of coins needed to continue a level with 5 extra moves is a bit much compared to the number received when you complete the level (300 vs 25-30 or so). I understand, though. It can't be too easy or else it would be boring & nobody would ever spend any $ to advance!😁

Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?Game Features✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters
descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters

description: Second part of the legendary Cut the Rope logic puzzles series. Keep your brain fit and boost your problem solving skills by mastering the tricky levels based on real-life physics. Tired of mind game? Just sit back and enjoy the cheerful and relaxing game atmosphere of one of the most beautiful free educational apps for kids. If you like Cut the Rope, you’ll love Cut the Rope 2!ALL NEW LOCATIONS TO EXPLORE! Experience 168 entirely new levels of rope cutting, mind boggling action.ALL NEW CHARACTERS TO MEET! Find 7 new characters, the Nommies, to help you solve puzzles.ALL NEW HATS TO BRAG ABOUT! Customize Om Nom, choose your favorite candy and select your finger traces.ALL NEW ADVENTURES FOR OM NOM! Experience completely new graphics, sound and gameplay elements, including the ability to move Om Nom. MEET OM NOM’S NEW FRIENDS, THE NOMMIES!  • Roto can carry Om Nom to the best candy catching locations. comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

This game is for people who want to spend literally £1000's otherwise your just being constantly attacked, wiped out and then you have to spend weeks/months trying to get back to where you were or maybe a little further. They should make it a little more equal for all. Shame really as the game itself has so much promise.

I enjoy the game a lot. It is pay to win in every sense of the word though. My problem is customer service is the worst. Takes 5 or 6 days to respond to help requests if they do at all. Good game, worst customer service possible.

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Addictive strategy game but again if you want to be strong you have to spend a fortune otherwise you would be crushed. Some roomers about cheating codes I heard from other players.
description: Do you play war games? Enjoy free online games? Then prepare yourself! The hottest free to play multiplayer war game of 2017 is here! King Arthur’s death has left an empty throne. Raise your dragon and build your army in the quest to lift Excalibur and become the next King of Avalon. In this dragon war, your mighty dragon is the key to ruling your kingdom. Stay alive by forging alliances with your friends and build an empire together. This is a game of kings entangled in a game of war. Who will be victorious in this clash of kings? FEATURES :War! Everywhere. You and your allies need to be prepared for a clash of clans. Build up your bases and bulk up your armies - you're not the only ones with eyes on the throne! Alliances! No man is an island. Whether you’re rallying against a GvE Barbarian leader or marching at a PvP bully, you’ll need allies you can trust. Dragons! A legendary weapon of mass destruction. How will you train yours? Chat! Easy-translation feature brings thousands of players from around the world together in realtime. Strategy! Get the edge through research and master devastating skills. comments: Game was quite easy since I'm a teenager and its geared towards kids, but I still found it enjoyable. More levels need to be added. Maybe even unlimited mini game mode where you try for high scores. Not the hidden objects one but the one where you stack food and also the eating food one. The game crashed a couple times on me and froze but it was fixable by closing it and going back in.

It's a great game fun to play. But you should also have some mini games to like where you have to stack the food or swipe bad items off the table. And you need to have more mysteries out as soon as possible because I was really getting into the game n I didn't have anymore to play

For a Scooby Doo fan it can be entertaining and it can be fun to see the gangs interactions with some level (If you get past the voice acting naming no names) especially the door the door challenge where the gang  was being chased  overall Scooby Doo in the characters then you might enjoy this game

BEST app EVER made for mobile gaming! I personally can't thank you enough for making this game! It doesn't even need the stupid IMHO energy to play! You can just play forever :) The only "bad" thing i think its the "poor" voice over! It has all the quotes for all gang members but i just wanted to hear all the captions written in the script with their voices. Other than that it's the best game ever played on my cellphone. <3

description: Almost every kid at least ever dreamed of becoming a real hero and saving lives. And now you have such an opportunity. With great joy, we present our new game "Firefighters - Rescue Patrol".When a fire rages, and fire devours a floor by floor, the most courageous and brave people - firefighters - always come to the rescue. Our game will help you feel like a real fireman, help to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of this wonderful profession, will show the challenges and difficulties that professional firefighters face every day.In our development game you will have many difficulties and dangers, to show resourcefulness and ingenuity. You will need to quickly equip the necessary tools with a fire truck and a fire helicopter and hurry to where your help is needed.And now, there was an alarm signal, somewhere there was a big trouble. Your fire truck is ready for departure. Save the lives of cute little animals that are in a burning house. Managing the helicopter take away from the raging sea of ​​disobedient kids who are in a dangerous situation and extinguish forest fires. description: Hello friends, today you are going to play crazy hospital games and be a doctor on a mission to cure all injuries of little clumsy patients that come to your clinic! Download Little Foot Doctor Games to perform various treatments for healing all sorts of wounds and have tons of fun playing emergency room games! Doctor games for teens are the best way to start practicing if you're dreaming of becoming a surgeon and save lives!Some of the things you can do in our doctor simulator games are:Perform emergency surgery on injured patients! Use real doctor tools to treat your patients!Choose one of the 6 different patients!Treat numerous foot injuries!* Fix broken bones – use the X-ray machine to locate fractures and heal broken bones!* Put ice on swollen feet to bring down the swelling!* Apply an ointment on painful skin burns and then put a bandage on – many colorful bandages to choose from!* Extract the pus from calluses using a needle!* Remove bits of shattered glass from the patient's foot using tweezers!* Do a laser treatment to remove dark patches of skin!* Spray bites and bandage the foot like a real doctor!* Treat open wounds – play stitching games, powder the wound and watch it disappear!* Finally, perform a pedicure! – using a magnifying glass, look at each nail closely, remove dirt, clip and buff the nails, get rid of cuticles and make the nails shine!If you love to play virtual surgery games, this amazing ambulance simulator is just the right choice for you. descriptionHTML:
Hello friends, today you are going to play crazy hospital games and be a doctor on a mission to cure all injuries of little clumsy patients that come to your clinic! Download Little Foot Doctor Games to perform various treatments for healing all sorts of wounds and have tons of fun playing emergency room games! Doctor games for teens are the best way to start practicing if you're dreaming of becoming a surgeon and save lives!

Some of the things you can do in our doctor simulator games are:

Perform emergency surgery on injured patients! Use real doctor tools to treat your patients!

Choose one of the 6 different patients!

Treat numerous foot injuries!
* Fix broken bones – use the X-ray machine to locate fractures and heal broken bones!
* Put ice on swollen feet to bring down the swelling!
* Apply an ointment on painful skin burns and then put a bandage on – many colorful bandages to choose from!
* Extract the pus from calluses using a needle!
* Remove bits of shattered glass from the patient's foot using tweezers!
* Do a laser treatment to remove dark patches of skin!
* Spray bites and bandage the foot like a real doctor!
* Treat open wounds – play stitching games, powder the wound and watch it disappear!
* Finally, perform a pedicure! – using a magnifying glass, look at each nail closely, remove dirt, clip and buff the nails, get rid of cuticles and make the nails shine!

If you love to play virtual surgery games, this amazing ambulance simulator is just the right choice for you. Simple interface will provide an outstanding user experience giving you the maximum amount of fun. Creative and educational gameplay will have you play this doctor simulator for hours!

Play with cool medical tools and engage in one of the coolest role playing games and pretend play games! Be a foot doctor in an emergency clinic and find out what it feels like to take care of little patients and work in a hospital! With Little Foot Doctor Games is a fun ambulance simulator where you can practice healing injured patients, treat foot fractures and perform necessary surgeries to make the patients healthy and happy again!

Most of us dream of becoming surgeons or heart doctors in some eminent hospital or become an ER DR or a nurse in an emergency room, and with these super fun clinic games, you can see what would it look like to be a foot doctor! Download Little Foot Doctor Games and work as a virtual doctor in a crazy hospital! Learn how to treat different injuries like a real doctor in our emergency room games!
summary: Treat clumsy patients that come to crazy hospital like a real virtual surgeon
title: Little Foot Doctor Games

comments: I absolutely loved this game, no matter how challenging it was at some points. This has definitely landed in my list of favorite games, for the story and concept are just so out there and unique. After a certain point, I stopped playing for the platforming aspect but more for the story. My only complaint for this game is that a lot of the levels are easily devoid of difficulty because of the flying ability. Can't wait for the sequel!

I absolutely loved this game. The story was charming, intriguing, heart-breaking, and so very addictive. I cleared the first seven or so worlds in my first sitting simply because I refused to put it down. I loved the simplicity of the game, how it didn't use fancy graphics to still be a fantastic game. I do hope a sequel or something of that nature comes out because there still a few questions I have about this game. Loved the soundtrack as well, it really helped set the mood for this game. Very adorable, very addictive, very fun to play. I recommend this game for anyone willing to put in the effort to play it. Developers did a fine job with this one. Kudos to you guys.

Why is this game so damn good? It has simple mechanics, you're a cat, you can jump, move, and become a liquid (hence the title). It was simple enough, then they added a new mechanic. So, I kept playing, I came to figure out how that worked. Then they added another new mechanic. The progression is very cleverly done, adding another once you've mastered the last addition.  My only real complaint is that sometimes the buttons seem unresponsive, and I think that's because the hitbox on the touchscreen buttons are smaller than they look, not sure. But, the levels are fun enough that I have to recommend this one to people. It's a lot of fun, very cute, and has an odd, little narrative.

I got this game because it looked cute and I love platform games like this. But man, when I discovered the actual point to this game I was thrown for a complete loop. Initially I didn't really pay attention to what was happening, but there was a point where I stopped playing for the levels and started playing for the story.  Honestly a very good game. My only gripe is the companion levels, due to the time constraint it's hard to pay attention to the story. It would be cool if there was a tab in the main menu to go read over the story.

Okay, I don't usually do reviews, but this is the exception.  I loved this game. I thought it was amazing. The narration in the background provided a well constricted mystery story that keeps you coming back to play it again. The art looks warm and fuzzy, and it runs smoothly on my pixel 2. The controls were a bit finicky at times, but you get used to it. Mechanics in this game were clever and creative. You can tell the level designers thought long and hard on what they want this game to be about.  Would I recommend this? Have you played doki doki literature club? Did you enjoy playing/watching doki doki literature club? If so, yes you should play this game. Do you like 2d platformers? You should play this game. Are you new to gaming? You should play this game. All around very balanced. Good job last quarter studios. I thoroughly enjoyed this game

I absolutely loved this game! Its SO AMAZING AND COOL I TOTALLY LOVE THE STORY AND THE LEVELS!!!! 😍😍😍😍😍😍My only problem was that I unlocked the area where you play as the gray square and when I got tired I pressed Exit and the next time I opened the game IT DIDN'T SAVE MY PROGRESS!!!! I think it might have been something that I did because it saved my progress every single time until now... 😞
description: - Play through 90 levels!- Find out what happened to the cat.- Challenging physics based gameplay.- Beautiful and colourful minimalistic world.- Only 8 ads in the entire game and no in app purchases!Cats are Liquid is a 2D platformer about a cat with the ability to transform into liquid.The game has 90 levels, that are spread across 9 different worlds. It has a minimalistic but colorful style. Along the way the game introduces new mechanics, like flying and summoning bombs to break down walls.The story is about a cat whose owner locked her in a set of rooms. She desperately wants to get out, but the rooms just keep continuing. Along the way the cat meets a new "friend" and gains new abilities. The story is told through small in game text pieces.The latest news about the game can be found on the @lastquarterdev Twitter feed.#CatsAreLiquid on Twitter
descriptionHTML:
- Play through 90 levels!
- Find out what happened to the cat.
- Challenging physics based gameplay.
- Beautiful and colourful minimalistic world.
- Only 8 ads in the entire game and no in app purchases!

Cats are Liquid is a 2D platformer about a cat with the ability to transform into liquid.

The game has 90 levels, that are spread across 9 different worlds. It has a minimalistic but colorful style. Along the way the game introduces new mechanics, like flying and summoning bombs to break down walls.

The story is about a cat whose owner locked her in a set of rooms. She desperately wants to get out, but the rooms just keep continuing. Along the way the cat meets a new "friend" and gains new abilities. The story is told through small in game text pieces.

The latest news about the game can be found on the @lastquarterdev Twitter feed.

#CatsAreLiquid on Twitter

comments: The game is a lot of fun, but since last update every time I watch a video for a 2nd free spin the game crashes. It'd be nice to see that fixed to get those spins back.

This game would easily get 5 stars, but..... There are a few things that need work. First the spots when you are too close to an object are not the same for each player. Two, some objects on the map are clear out of the way on your throwing trajectory, but you still hit them after you take your shot. When you get close to the goal of sometimes backs u yo behind an object making it impossible to make the shot.

It's okay for now, but definitely needs improvement.  Personally think the throwing dynamic is all wrong, need to be able to throw a hizer shot and angle discs.   Disc selections are ok, but purely built around making money in game. Selection of actual disc golf discs would be good, rather than what's available at the moment.  Appreciate its new and only one like it so far, purchased the starter pack to help developers on their way but won't be spending any more money on it.  Some sort of power up button for drives aswell as getting it in the middle for a perfect throw would be great.   But overall, discs need completely rethinking as not a good angle to go in my opinion

Its a good little game. But at this point in time there isn't a terrible amount of content to keep you occupied for too long. New content needs to be added ASAP. Each course has one or two holes. Not multiple holes like an actual course, which in turn makes it seems repetitive. Playing online isnt great because its so slow. but i think that is only because there is so few people playing the game at this moment. Why do characters have different power when they can all throw it the same distance? As far as i can tell you can only play a match while betting 25 coins, are you for real? I mean no wonder the game isn't more popular. All things considered the game could be so much worse. But lack of a broad player base leaves the game feeling like waste.
No drop in's is such a joke. Many glitches. Discs land and you end up shooting from and entirely different spot. Learn some more about disc golf first. Decent gameplay.

The game was fun at first but just cheats you can't be anywhere near a wall of white slams into the wall the meters suck in the people that you play you just can't beat I'm just updating this game gets worse and worse every single time I play it

description: Have you ever dreamt about becoming a princess of a far-away candy land ? Give yourself a virtual makeover on your phone or tablet with the new Candy Mirror-Fantasy Makeover app from Bear Hug! You can instantly transfer into a candy land girl!Just download this app, then your phone or tablet will turn into a fabulous digital mirror! Press buttons to select from 12 different trendy candy full makeup looks, or go to DIY module, be as creative as you can to mix and match more than 50 vivid color eye shadow, lipstick, blush and hair fashion accessories! Even more unbelievable, like I just mentioned, ALL of these makeup looks are composed with lollipops, gummy bears, jelly beans and candy worms!Added with sugar-coated photo frames, rainbow smokes, and jewelries, the photo decoration in this app will amaze you further away! With this app, you can make insanely cool selfies for your social network, holiday season greeting cards, materials for school projects or even simply just show your talent in fashion your parents!Even more amazing, Candy Mirror @Bear Hug works like a real mirror - when you turn your head or change your expression, face-tracking technology makes sure your makeover moves with you, just like it's really on your face!FABULOUS FEATURES!-1. Use Candy Mirror @Bear Hug app to give yourself a candy-made surreal makeovers. -2. Try on 12 pre-designed, ready-to-wear looks. -3. Mix and match more than 50 eye, lip and cheek look.-4. Take picture and customize your photos using stickers, glitters, frames and more!HOW TO PLAY?When you launch the app, frame your face into the cropped area on the screen.When it's ready, you will see a full makeup applied on your face automatically.Apply virtual eye shadow, lipstick, glitter, ready-to-wear looks to live video of yourself for no-mess candy style makeovers. For a completely new look, just erase and try again.Our face-tracking technology ensures that your virtual makeup moves with your changing expressions, just like it's really on your face!Once you create the sweetest makeover for yourself, you can save your looks in the app and customize them with digital photo frames, stickers, and more. descriptionHTML:
Have you ever dreamt about becoming a princess of a far-away candy land ?

Give yourself a virtual makeover on your phone or tablet with the new Candy Mirror-Fantasy Makeover app from Bear Hug! You can instantly transfer into a candy land girl!

Just download this app, then your phone or tablet will turn into a fabulous digital mirror! Press buttons to select from 12 different trendy candy full makeup looks, or go to DIY module, be as creative as you can to mix and match more than 50 vivid color eye shadow, lipstick, blush and hair fashion accessories! Even more unbelievable, like I just mentioned, ALL of these makeup looks are composed with lollipops, gummy bears, jelly beans and candy worms!

Added with sugar-coated photo frames, rainbow smokes, and jewelries, the photo decoration in this app will amaze you further away! With this app, you can make insanely cool selfies for your social network, holiday season greeting cards, materials for school projects or even simply just show your talent in fashion your parents!

Even more amazing, Candy Mirror @Bear Hug works like a real mirror - when you turn your head or change your expression, face-tracking technology makes sure your makeover moves with you, just like it's really on your face!


FABULOUS FEATURES!

-1. Use Candy Mirror @Bear Hug app to give yourself a candy-made surreal makeovers.
-2. Try on 12 pre-designed, ready-to-wear looks.
-3. Mix and match more than 50 eye, lip and cheek look.
-4. Take picture and customize your photos using stickers, glitters, frames and more!

HOW TO PLAY?
When you launch the app, frame your face into the cropped area on the screen.
When it's ready, you will see a full makeup applied on your face automatically.
Apply virtual eye shadow, lipstick, glitter, ready-to-wear looks to live video of yourself for no-mess candy style makeovers.
For a completely new look, just erase and try again.
Our face-tracking technology ensures that your virtual makeup moves with your changing expressions, just like it's really on your face!
Once you create the sweetest makeover for yourself, you can save your looks in the app and customize them with digital photo frames, stickers, and more.



Wanna have more fun? Having problems or suggestions? We would love to hear from you!

You can find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/BearHugMediaPrincessGames
Or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/bear_hug_media
For more information about Bear Hug Media, please visit http://www.bearhugmedia.com
summary: FREE magic app transforms your face into a princess from sweet candy land!
